data.title: MOZY EMC Data Protection Suite
data.meta_description: CARREL TECHNOLOGIES� is a high-end technology service provider that focuses on delivering game-changing revolutionary technology applications in Eastern Africa. Carrel provides world-class expertise in consulting, design, project management, application development, implementation and maintenance in the fields of technology infrastructure, high-end business applications, mission-critical IT hardware, specialized IT training and technology consulting among other services.
data.text:
The EMC® Data Protection Suite available through Carrel Technologies Ltd. provides companies with a high quality software solution that supports backup, archiving, and data compliance in a single set. The package is easy to purchase and deploy because it is part of a single suite. It is ideal for both physical and virtual environments. This suit can give your company flexibility, control, and scalability to meet your current and future needs affordably.

EMC Avamar

EMC AVAMAR provides our clients with a fast, scalable and deduplication backup software. The software is ideal for virtual environments and for network-attached storage (NAS). In addition, it is useful in enterprise applications, remote offices, and in desktops and laptops.

EMC Networker

The EMC Networker enables clients to centralise their backup and recovery operations. This ability connects legacy systems and next-generation systems seamlessly thereby increasing data security in a data centre.

EMC SourceOne Archiving

The EMC SourceOne Archiving solution provides clients with three advantages. First, it improves the efficiency of the operations of the system. Secondly, it facilitates IT governance in the system and thirdly, it supports rapid response to demands made on the system. The system also has advanced information archiving facilities.

EMC Data Protection Advisor

The EMC data protection advisor is a data protection management system that enables administrators to use automated monitoring, analysis and reporting for greater overall management of the system.

EMC MOZY Enterprise

The EMC MOZY Enterprise system gives users the ability to deploy multiple user environments for cloud-based data backup and recovery.

EMC Data Domain Boost

The EMC Data Domain Boost gives users more speed in backup operations. It gives them more control over their backups to the Data Domain Systems by using native utilities.

EMC Syncplicity

EMC Syncplicity provides users with easy syncing, sharing, and collaboration options in addition to real-time protection of documents. This application is available for use in laptops, desktops, and mobile and hybrid cloud.
